content: carl the cardinal is a sweet crochet pattern perfect for yourself or to give as a gift he works up quickly with super bulky weight yarn and is so fun to crochet tuck this cute cardinal into your holiday decor or give as a gift for old or young alike this cardinal bird amigurumi has plenty of easy to work details that add to his adorable charm note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own cardinal skill level intermediate pattern is written in english using standard american terms > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern size the cardinal is approximately 6 tall x 4 5 wide materials needed - super bulky weight #6 yarn exact brand and color provided - crochet hook sizes h/8 5 00 mm - 10 mm safety eyes - fiberfill - stitch marker - tapestry needle and scissors pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-cardinal/
